parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: ConfigureMode
parameters.description: The configuration mode. Valid values: ApplyOnce: The configuration is applied only once. After a configuration is updated, the new configuration is applied. ApplyAndMonitor: The configuration is applied only once. After the configuration is applied, the system only checks whether the configuration is migrated in the future. ApplyAndAutoCorrect: The configuration is always applied.

parameters.name: StateConfigurationId
parameters.description: The ID of the desired-state configuration.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to be added to the configuration.
